remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會平行的某些成員類別，用來報告的事件資料，但這兩個類別都有不同的用途。This class parallels some of the members class, which is used to report event data for , but the two classes serve different purposes. 特別是用於覆寫，其提供類別並未公開為中的公用事件的事件處理[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。 is specifically used for overrides, which offers class handling for an event that is not exposed as a public event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為兩個布林參數，請注意，您應該報告這些做為`true`只有在值中的變更會轉譯為或應該解譯為這類的值，如果讀取現有的值。For the two Boolean parameters, note that you should report these as `true` only if the changes in the value are significant to rendering, or should interpret the values as such if reading existing values. 有效位數的副作用，因為可能的大小值的些微變更會特別是當數學函數會套用至雙精度浮點數值。Minor changes in the size values are possible due to precision side-effects, particularly when mathematical functions are applied to the double values.
